title: Siemens India to spinoff energy operations
description: Siemens Ltd. has approved a proposed demerger of its energy business into a separate unit, with the Indian unit of the German engineering firm Siemens AG also approving the immediate incorporation of a wholly-owned unit in Mumbai.
